page.title: 10 New Housing Development
page.content:
Along Flexford Road there is a lot of rural countryside. But now all that is going to change with a brand new Housing Estate.
This new Housing Estate will have 1700 houses with a lot of new features including cycleways.
This estate will be situated between Knightswood Farm and Manor Farm. When we spoke to some of the people involved they had mixed feelings.
It will be a village in it's self including public services such as a school, playing fields, a few shops a nature reserve and public transport.
This will radically change the countryside and population of the area.
